home.title: Waitport - Real-time & Predicted Airport Security Queues
home.description: Check live and predicted security queue wait times at major European airports. Plan your trip effectively with Waitport's real-time data and future estimates.
about.title: About Waitport
about.description: Welcome to Waitport! Here, you can track security waiting times across major European airports in real-time. We also provide conservative security queue predictions for future dates and times. This helps you plan your trip more effectively and avoid unexpected delays.
about.select: Select an airport below to see the current and predicted security queue times.
todayQueue.description: Live security‑queue wait time, updated every few minutes.
prediction.title: Prediction
prediction.description: Estimated wait time for the date & time you pick below.
picker.label: Select date & time for prediction
historical.title: Historical
historical.description: What the queue looked like at roughly this time yesterday, one month ago, and one year ago.
expectedQueueHorizon: Expected queue over the next {hours} hour(s) (forecasts update every few hours)
